channel.title: KenSmith tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from KenSmith.

item.description: The idea that students can skip the empty exercises and start doing real work that has a chance to matter in the world. Why wait so long? Why wait any longer? https://t.co/Hws4CVgqKw
item.source:markdown: The idea that students can skip the empty exercises and start doing real work that has a chance to matter in the world. Why wait so long? Why wait any longer? https://t.co/Hws4CVgqKw

item.description:
"Runs on sunlight and rain" -- Recent tweet threads from James Rebanks, @HerdyShepherd1, share the good news about nature's ability to generate and regenerate, if only we spot the patterns and act accordingly. https://t.co/9zzVP28dXX

@herdyshepherd1 People too generate and regenerate the good things about their lives, given enough resources, given a chance -- as above, "if only we spot the patterns and act accordingly."
item.source:markdown:
"Runs on sunlight and rain" -- Recent tweet threads from James Rebanks, @HerdyShepherd1, share the good news about nature's ability to generate and regenerate, if only we spot the patterns and act accordingly. https://t.co/9zzVP28dXX
@herdyshepherd1 People too generate and regenerate the good things about their lives, given enough resources, given a chance -- as above, "if only we spot the patterns and act accordingly."

item.description: Ag schools might call these indirect measures, but I wonder if they are actually, instead, more comprehensive ones. https://t.co/fCdg46mGHo
item.source:markdown: Ag schools might call these indirect measures, but I wonder if they are actually, instead, more comprehensive ones. https://t.co/fCdg46mGHo

item.description: If memory serves me, in 1974 you could sit on the grass outside the U.S. Mint in Denver, but now there is heavy, decorative barrier fencing near the sidewalk. A post-Oklahoma City installation, I'm guessing. https://t.co/MqtIIMbxYJ
item.source:markdown: If memory serves me, in 1974 you could sit on the grass outside the U.S. Mint in Denver, but now there is heavy, decorative barrier fencing near the sidewalk. A post-Oklahoma City installation, I'm guessing. https://t.co/MqtIIMbxYJ

item.description: “No, sir, we do not carry your size in any of our North American stores. We can have a pair shipped here by October.” https://t.co/1pswGdjTrX
item.source:markdown: “No, sir, we do not carry your size in any of our North American stores. We can have a pair shipped here by October.” https://t.co/1pswGdjTrX

item.description:
Around May 1, 1974, U. S. newspapers started printing long sections of the Watergate tape transcripts. My friends and I bought a copy of the big Denver paper and the three of us sat on the lawn of the Denver Mint. 1/2 https://t.co/qFj2AC09OW

We each took different characters from the transcripts and we read them aloud there, reenacting the White House machinations of Nixon and his team now revealed in fine detail to the American people. 2/2
item.source:markdown:
Around May 1, 1974, U. S. newspapers started printing long sections of the Watergate tape transcripts. My friends and I bought a copy of the big Denver paper and the three of us sat on the lawn of the Denver Mint. 1/2 https://t.co/qFj2AC09OW
We each took different characters from the transcripts and we read them aloud there, reenacting the White House machinations of Nixon and his team now revealed in fine detail to the American people. 2/2

item.description: Many are frustrated by how long it's taking to get the January 6th and other investigations done. This timeline from Watergate can provide some perspective. https://t.co/2c8eUCAuZ2
item.source:markdown: Many are frustrated by how long it's taking to get the January 6th and other investigations done. This timeline from Watergate can provide some perspective. https://t.co/2c8eUCAuZ2

item.description: Some ways of thinking about organizing a longer work of nonfiction or memoir. https://t.co/aMGOYnCEB9
item.source:markdown: Some ways of thinking about organizing a longer work of nonfiction or memoir. https://t.co/aMGOYnCEB9

item.description: "America seeing itself clearly is the first step toward owning and then learning from its mistakes." https://t.co/qoMyFwzloG
item.source:markdown: "America seeing itself clearly is the first step toward owning and then learning from its mistakes." https://t.co/qoMyFwzloG

item.description: NASA's Do It Yourself Podcast site provides audio, video and approaches to building quality NASA content into your own podcast. https://t.co/ED1mmgTwzd
item.source:markdown: NASA's Do It Yourself Podcast site provides audio, video and approaches to building quality NASA content into your own podcast. https://t.co/ED1mmgTwzd

item.description: For many in the GOP, the time for obeying the law is over. https://t.co/lWhzpGJn5S?
item.source:markdown: For many in the GOP, the time for obeying the law is over. https://t.co/lWhzpGJn5S?

item.description: For many in the GOP, the time for respecting the law is over.
item.source:markdown: For many in the GOP, the time for respecting the law is over.

item.description: "For starters, we need to stop the creep of financialization and securitization into agriculture. [Steps like these] place control of crucial natural resources firmly in the hands of the richest people on earth, while encouraging asset bubbles." https://t.co/n77AqO3dEQ
item.source:markdown: "For starters, we need to stop the creep of financialization and securitization into agriculture. [Steps like these] place control of crucial natural resources firmly in the hands of the richest people on earth, while encouraging asset bubbles." https://t.co/n77AqO3dEQ

item.description: "To lament the end of the manual transmission is to eulogize much more than shifting gears." https://t.co/rY1v1rmofx
item.source:markdown: "To lament the end of the manual transmission is to eulogize much more than shifting gears." https://t.co/rY1v1rmofx

item.description: "This is the moment when space policy in this country changed from the 'we choose to go to the moon' era to the 'this is all we can afford right now' era—the space shuttle era." https://t.co/xPxr8jS0Sk
item.source:markdown: "This is the moment when space policy in this country changed from the 'we choose to go to the moon' era to the 'this is all we can afford right now' era—the space shuttle era." https://t.co/xPxr8jS0Sk

item.description: @RayBoomhower My takeaway from the first half of Norman Mailer’s novel was that whoever had the rank to lead a patrol out into the jungle on Guadalcanal would soon be dead. The book taught that lesson repeatedly, if I remember correctly.
item.source:markdown: @RayBoomhower My takeaway from the first half of Norman Mailer’s novel was that whoever had the rank to lead a patrol out into the jungle on Guadalcanal would soon be dead. The book taught that lesson repeatedly, if I remember correctly.

item.description: @RayBoomhower https://t.co/P0s3oxFy3a This radio play seems to include some reporting by Robert C. Miller and suggests his name as the answer.
item.source:markdown: @RayBoomhower https://t.co/P0s3oxFy3a This radio play seems to include some reporting by Robert C. Miller and suggests his name as the answer.

item.description: Trump asked for military parades. One general's reply: ‘I actually grew up in Portugal. Portugal was a dictatorship — and parades were about showing the people who had the guns. And in this country, we don’t do that. It’s not who we are.’ https://t.co/4gZnEyMEEL
item.source:markdown: Trump asked for military parades. One general's reply: ‘I actually grew up in Portugal. Portugal was a dictatorship — and parades were about showing the people who had the guns. And in this country, we don’t do that. It’s not who we are.’ https://t.co/4gZnEyMEEL

item.description: You could write a small manual, A Taxonomy of Stock Comments, that described and categorized the instant responses so many people give on social media. https://t.co/r6JCDiyQ7O
item.source:markdown: You could write a small manual, A Taxonomy of Stock Comments, that described and categorized the instant responses so many people give on social media. https://t.co/r6JCDiyQ7O

item.description: @SteveHinnefeld Not that I recall. But it was very alert to all the woods around it, craning its head this way and that.
item.source:markdown: @SteveHinnefeld Not that I recall. But it was very alert to all the woods around it, craning its head this way and that.

item.description: Owl on our walk today inside the South Bend, Indiana city limits at Rum Village Park. It looked more brown in person than this photo shows. https://t.co/Uj5mmNOK6B
item.source:markdown: Owl on our walk today inside the South Bend, Indiana city limits at Rum Village Park. It looked more brown in person than this photo shows. https://t.co/Uj5mmNOK6B

item.description: When Twitter reveals the algorithm by which Trending lists are compiled, then I will take them seriously as news. Until then, I will think of them as marketing and as corporate manipulation--that is, as serious in a different way. https://t.co/KUszyH41Qm
item.source:markdown: When Twitter reveals the algorithm by which Trending lists are compiled, then I will take them seriously as news. Until then, I will think of them as marketing and as corporate manipulation--that is, as serious in a different way. https://t.co/KUszyH41Qm

item.description: The temperature just dropped several degrees as I stood on the sidewalk watching the front come in. https://t.co/2TTpwDVRhI
item.source:markdown: The temperature just dropped several degrees as I stood on the sidewalk watching the front come in. https://t.co/2TTpwDVRhI
